86739110cc7be4b02b9154330ae817fbe49bd638.name: Animes

b6c7682cd49985237926bb003209d2bd04b4e5b7.name: MediaDetails
b6c7682cd49985237926bb003209d2bd04b4e5b7.source:
query MediaDetails($mediaId: Int) {
  Media(id: $mediaId) {
    __typename
    title {
      __typename
      romaji
      english
      native
    }
    type
    format
    status
    description
    startDate {
      __typename
      year
      month
      day
    }
    endDate {
      __typename
      year
      month
      day
    }
    season
    episodes
    duration
    chapters
    volumes
    coverImage {
      __typename
      large
      color
    }
    bannerImage
    averageScore
    meanScore
    popularity
    genres
    synonyms
    favourites
  }
}
